Published January 11 2015

Fire in the Amazon

Fire in the Amazon — One of Amazon’s in-progress data centers had a small fire, which was quickly resolved. This isn’t so much news; rather, it serves as a pragmatic example that our “cloud” is really just a collection of physical buildings, holding copies of our data. If you don’t have a backup system in place, here’s a gentle reminder to get moving.

Enjoy your day.
